summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 14%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (up 7 mbar) and cloud levels (up 484 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles) and cloud levels (up 172 m) when compared to today.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 397m to 2140m and averaged 783.5m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; heat will be very noticeable, though not extreme. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and breezy at times. Drizzle or light rain possible, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and very bright daylight. Weather could become unsettled.
